input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product name information.

Product name:
Reynolds Freezer Paper 150 Sq. Ft. (Pack of 6)

Product features:
Plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes
Easy-to-write-on surface
Plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing
Buy food in bulk and save money

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Reynolds Freezer Paper is a plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes. The plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing. Reynolds Freezer Paper is easy-to-write-on and can be used to label frozen foods for easy identification. Use Reynolds Freezer Paper to buy food in bulk and save money by preserving the freshness of your food.
input_text.Response B: Reynolds Freezer Paper 150 Sq. Ft. (Pack of 6) is a must-have for any household. This versatile paper is perfect for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes. The plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor, and nutrition of foods during freezing. It's also easy to write on, so you can easily label your frozen foods. This paper is perfect for buying food in bulk and saving money. Each roll measures 18"x25". There are 6 rolls per pack.

label_annotations.factors_a: Gave all the correct information but seemed very cut and paste from the description, no extras.
label_annotations.factors_b: 18x25 is not 150 square feet, it is 450. Incorrect maths from answer B.
